entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
